newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: SOCCER-FEYENOORD BREAK TRANSFER RECORD FOR CRUZ.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-FEYENOORD BREAK TRANSFER RECORD FOR CRUZ.

text.p: Feyenoord Rotterdam have signed Argentine striker Julio Ricardo Cruz from River Plate.
Feyenoord would not specify the fee, estimated at more than nine million guilders ($4.5 million), but said on Thursday the five-year contract was a club record.
The Dutch club's previous highest pay-out was 3.6 million guilders ($1.8 million) for Polish midfielder Iwan Tomek two years ago.

Cruz's signing brought the number of close season arrivals at Feyenoord to five. They have already brought in Dutch midfielder Paul Bosvelt, Russian forward Igor Korneev, Hungarian goalkeeper Zsolt Petry and Irish striker David Connolly.
Gaston Taument and Ed de Goey have left while defender Ronald Koeman has retired.
